abstract: Orlando Marin started his first band when he was 16. Sixty years later, he is still playing, and what he plays is the mambo.
snippet: Orlando Marin started his first band when he was 16. Sixty years later, he is still playing, and what he plays is the mambo.
lead_paragraph: With a red vest gleaming against his smart black suit, the Last Mambo King took center stage. Orlando Marin screwed on the timbales with white-gloved hands, eyed his fellow musicians, and then - bam! - mambo filled the South Street Seaport lounge. His brush stroked a cymbal; he sang out in Spanish and bobbed his head.

headline.main: At 77, 'Last Mambo King' Refuses to Let the Rhythm Fade
